author: Eric Davis
comment: I would be happy if I could have full time ambiant mode but also a little brighter... Shoot wait.. I did find that.. 5 stars!

author: Cheron Smith
comment: Paid for the watch face and it worked beautifully until I switched from and back to  the face. Now it no longer syncs and surprise surprise, there's a new version of the face (that I would have to pay for). For shame!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please give us your situation in detail.
Let me confirm,sync error occurred on your watch?
Please feel free to contact our email address,We can give you a help.
Thank you.

title: Waste of money

author: Ivan P
comment: The ability to customize it with different colors for my outfits. Fix that and you get 5 *
title: Everything I need Except

comment: Okay, so I don't need to know the wind speed and really don't care if the moon or Sun will come up or not. Everything including temperature, humidity, it's very easy to tell what your battery level is in the phone and on the watch. I was a bit disappointed when clouds showed up on my watch but it was a clear sky. Somehow that changed and now it's correct. It does suck up some battery,  Outstanding!  Ok one small con. Uses 9% battery while idle. I have to charge daily instead of every two days
title: Best idea ever!

author: Justin Sobojinski
comment: The only thing I would like is a feels like temperature instead of the actual temperature. Please include this if possible.
title: Almost perfect.

author: ezridr1234
comment: It's always running in the background even if it's not chosen. Task manager can't stop it either, done a full reset and it's the first and top app running still. Kills battery, I'm done with it. More cash down the drain due to Google's 15 minute rule.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.I'd like to improve and please feel free to contact our email address.
We can give you a help.Thank you.

title: Can't stop it from running

author: RJ Hill
comment: Nice to find lots of info on android wear.The only thing I missed from my pebble.Thanks.
title: Wow

author: Gordon Koh
comment: Worth the price! Makes the wear experience much better with a very nice watch face.
title: Very beautiful design

author: Rik Posthumus
comment: Nice set of options. Love how you can change the dimmed screen color.
title: I dig it

author: Scott Sheehan

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.We can give you a help.Please feel free to contact our email address and give us more info about it in detail.Generally, please check your watch's android OS version. 5.0 or above is required.
Thank you.

title: Not showing in android wear app

comment: Nice watch. Color options seem quite standard so please add some
title: Nice watch

author: Craig Ueltzen
comment: Not as clear and easy to see/read as my favorite from this dev, the F04 face. Hands are too hard to distinguish from the rest in ambient mode.
title: It's okay.

author: Barry Morgan
comment: Stays running in the background doing god knows what, eats battery even when not in use other than that not a bad watch face.
